text: Koraa, ‘yisakale bibhraantita ache, parama karaunamaye sihamtaka pracura arakasa diba, arasesata yetiya sihamte seya pratyaksabharae dekhibalai paba yi bisaye sihamtaka satarka karaa haichila, seya sastiye'i ha'omka ba kiyamate'i ha'omka, tetiyahe sihamte janibalai paba maryadara ksetrata kona nikrsta arau dalabalara ksetrata kona durbala’
